MFA_DISABLED.name: MFA disabled
MFA_DISABLED.description: The user has not been enrolled in multi-factor authentication. This makes them more vulnerable to attackers who gain access to their password.

MFA_NOT_ENFORCED.name: MFA not enforced
MFA_NOT_ENFORCED.description: The user has been enrolled in multi-factor authentication but has not completed the registration process. Non-browser apps can still access the account with just the user's own password.
